subject: Pluggable Selector considered harmful? (Re: [junit] Re: Observations from a prod
msgSnippet: ... Selector ... dynamically. That s exactly what I wanted to point out in my posting yesterday about the tool support - only that I feel that this is a more
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Kent Beck" <kentb@...> wrote:
>
> Joe,
>
> When I was looking at lots of Smalltalk code that used Pluggable
Selector
> the consequence I found most annoying was that I could not delete
> seemingly-unreferenced methods because they might be invoked
dynamically.

That's exactly what I wanted to point out in my posting yesterday
about the "tool support" - only that I feel that this is a more
general problem than just "being annoying".

Regards
Harald M.
